DataElement.preferredName: Medical Imaging Tissue Collection Timepoint Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text descriptor of the timepoint in a medical imaging study at which a tissue specimen was collected.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function._several things grouped together._A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event.

Concepts.definition: In medicine, any technology which helps in visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for the screening, diagnosis, surgical procedure or therapy.
An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function.
The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.
A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event.
A condition or state at a particular time.

DataElement.changeDescription: Created to support Virginia Commonwealth University Imaging trial in C3D.
